channel.title: Error Loading Please Report--->Aggroth
channel.description: I got Aggroth client+source, but when i run my client it says error loading please report, i went on signlink.java and put c:/Aggroth/ and i had a folder in my c: drive called Aggroth i also put one in the guest user since im on guest but they both didnt seem to help? i also compiled the client but it still didn't work i got the latest jdk/java please can anyone help? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Error Loading Please Report--->Aggroth
item.dc:creator: @privatescape privatescape
item.description:

it said there should be auto download cache but there isnt

Read full topic

item.title: Error Loading Please Report--->Aggroth
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Make sure you have the full cache and that it’s the correct one.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Loading Please Report--->Aggroth
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“privatescape, post:1, topic:544538”]I got Aggroth client+source, but when i run my client it says error loading please report, i went on signlink.java and put c:/Aggroth/ and i had a folder in my c: drive called Aggroth i also put one in the guest user since im on guest but they both didnt seem to help?
i also compiled the client but it still didn’t work i got the latest jdk/java
please can anyone help? [/quote]

C:/Aggroth

C should be capitalized. If that doesn’t fix it, then adding in an extra forward-slash or removing a forward-slash can sometimes cause problems. Make sure the directory for signlink matches that of C:/ CACHE. It’s case sensitive.

Read full topic
